Package ug_4.rant

Class RegisterActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • ug_4.rant.RegisterActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
    public class RegisterActivity
extends android.app.Activity

    Rant Register Activity

    Implements functionality for register.xml. Allows a user to register for the app Rant by sending credentials to the database.
    Since:
    2021-01-25
    Author:
    Sergio Perez-Valentin

      • readyToSubmit

        private boolean readyToSubmit​(boolean ready)
        This method is used to validate that all the fields are in proper format before registering. Changes sign up button color when all fields are in proper format.
        Parameters:
        ready - If the user is wanting to send the information to the database.
        Returns:
        boolean Returns if all fields are in proper format.

      • isValidFullName

        private boolean isValidFullName​(java.lang.String fullName,
                                java.lang.Boolean throwError)
        This method is used to validate if a string is a valid full name. If the user is submitting, an error will be thrown with proper details if the full name is not valid.
        Parameters:
        fullName - The string that needs to be validated
        throwError - If a error hint needs to be given to user
        Returns:
        boolean Returns if the string is a valid full name.

      • isValidEmail

        private boolean isValidEmail​(java.lang.String email,
                             java.lang.Boolean throwError)
        This method is used to validate if a string is a valid email. If the user is submitting, an error will be thrown with proper details if the email is not valid.
        Parameters:
        email - The string that needs to be validated
        throwError - If a error hint needs to be given to user
        Returns:
        boolean Returns if the string is a valid email.

      • isValidPassword

        private boolean isValidPassword​(java.lang.String password,
                                java.lang.Boolean throwError)
        This method is used to validate if a string is a valid password. If the user is submitting, an error will be thrown with proper details if the password is not valid.
        Parameters:
        password - The string that needs to be validated
        throwError - If a error hint needs to be given to user
        Returns:
        boolean Returns if the string is a valid password.
